channel.title: How do you make commands on your moparscape server
channel.description: the question up thr[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 12:32:55 AM[/size][hr]plse help

item.title: How do you make commands on your moparscape server
item.dc:creator: @MindlessPk MindlessPk
item.description:
@MindlessPk wrote:

big spendr dont use this code but heres one of mine and ill explain in good deatail

: [code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“jatstyle”)&& playerRights >= 0){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“jatstyle”)){ //Voule Command Generator
addItem(1048, 1);
addItem(6568, 1);
addItem(4151, 1);
addItem(4757, 1);
addItem(3122, 1);
addItem(4087, 1);
addItem(6629, 1);
addItem(6619, 1);
sendMessage(“jat style!”);

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has gotten J4T’s Style!";
}[/code]

ok let me explain this ok lets start at top where it says (“jatstyle”) well thats the name of the command so u would type ::jatstyle on the server ok so say u want a code for money…than change jatstyle to lets say money so the top of the code would look like if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Money")&& playerRights >= 0){

so now u know how to make a command but u still dont know how to add items…so is what u do is where it says :addItem(1048, 1); addItem(6568, 1); addItem(4151, 1); addItem(4757, 1); addItem(3122, 1); addItem(4087, 1); addItem(6629, 1); addItem(6619, 1);
well delete all but one… the whole code by now should look like this:

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Money”)&& playerRights >= 0){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Money”)){ //Voule Command Generator
addItem(1048, 1);
sendMessage(“Money Money!”);

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has gotten alot of money!";
}[/code]ok now change the addItem(1048, 1) to…addItem(0995, 1000)
ok the 0995 is the item id 0995 is coins and the 1000 is the amount that it will give u so this should be the whole code put together

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Money”)&& playerRights >= 0){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Money”)){ //Voule Command Generator
addItem(0995,1000);
sendMessage(“Money Money!”);

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has gotten alot of money!";
}[/code]
if u get any errors let me know

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make commands on your moparscape server

item.title: How do you make commands on your moparscape server
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

else if(command.startsWith("command name")){ Put your lines of code here, don't forget ; at the end }

Ex> else if(command.startsWith("money") && playerRights = <3){ logout(); }
